metadata.name: Kadıköy I
metadata.description:
We started **Inventory** series in Kadıköy district in Istanbul which is our own neighborhood, practicing on methodology & process of capturing a selection of objects in wide range of complexity, size and number with photogrammetry: Bollards, dilapidated cars, benches, concrete pots, mail boxes with paint, stickers and graffiti on them. 

While composing **Kadıköy Inventory** we let the coincidences lead the way — a random arrangement of assets was applied referencing the chaotic soul of the city.

location: Kadıköy, Istanbul
documentation date: 2018
image size: 15360 × 8640 pixels
